original_text: “‘There are some that only chew the cud or only have a divided hoof, but you must not eat them. The camel, though it chews the cud, does not have a divided hoof; it is ceremonially unclean for you.
korean_text: 새김질하는 것이나 굽이 갈라진 짐승 중에도 너희가 먹지 못할 것은 이러하니 낙타는 새김질은 하되 굽이 갈라지지 아니하였으므로 너희에게 부정하고

sentences.original_text: There are some that only chew the cud
or only have a divided hoof
but you must not eat them
The camel, though it chews the cud
does not have a divided hoof
it is ceremonially unclean for you
